Posts.Content: Apr 9, 2010 06:42PM mofend wrote: Hi - just in case you're totally scared of chemo, like we all are, check out the thread about those starting chemo in February 2010 - it will give you an idea of the various side effects we have been having - chemo is scary, but now that I'm halfway through it, I'm glad I made the decision, as a Stage IIA grade 3 to go ahead with it.  It's really not that bad and there's so much support for any difficulties.  I wish you luck in your decision and hope whatever it is you choose, that you are comfortable with your final decision.  PS  Losing your hair is really no big deal!  I know that's what so many people are afraid of.
Posts.Title: StageIIA, Oncotype 17- NO CHEMO, Are you Agree? yunlee72 ColoGal
